DriverConfigParam.Description: Proxy Auto Config Url
EnableNativeEvents(true) so as to perform native events smoothly on IE
Auto Detect Proxy Setting?
Path to extension to be enabled
Only for Internet Explorer | Set "false" if dont want to clear the Internet Explorer cache before launching the browser
Ignore Internet Explorer protected mode
Only for Internet Explorer & Firefox | Set "true" for using 64Bit Browser
Use specific Version of browser. Only Testing browser versions are supported.
Use Browser In Private/Incognito Mode (Please use 64bit Browse with Internet Explorer
Set "true" to Launch the Browser minimized
Set the minimum log level to read the console logs from the browser console.
Only for Edge: Open Edge browser in IE Mode
Provide the path to the browser executable.
Hide the Driver Console (Command Prompt) Window
Only For Chrome : Use a valid device name from the DevTools Emulation panel.
Only For Chrome & Firefox : A browser's user agent string (UA) helps identify which browser is being used, what version, and on which operating system
The height in pixels of the browser's viewable area
The width in pixels of the browser's viewable area
Only for Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Brave | Full path for the User Profile folder
Only for Chrome | Define Download Folder path
Amount of time the driver should wait when searching for an element if it is not immediately present
HttpServer Timeout for Web Action Completion. Default/Recommended is minimum 60 secs
PageLoad Timeout for Web Action Completion
Defines the current session’s page loading strategy.you can change from the default parameter of normal to eager or none
Start BMP - Browser Mob Proxy (true/false)
Start BMP .BAT File - full path to BMP BAT file
Start BMP Port
Take Only Active Frame Or Window Screen Shot In Case Of Failure
Selenium line arguments || Set Selenium arguments separated with ; sign
Change to Iframe automatically in case of POM Element execution
Sample Value is 'localhost:9222'.This allows to Connect to existing browser session on specific debug port instead of Launching a new browser
Specifies the state of current session’s user prompt handler, You can change it from dismiss, accept, dismissAndNotify, acceptAndNotify, ignore
Use custom browser driver. Provide complete driver path with file extension
Browser Type
Proxy Server:Port
Set multiple By Pass Proxy URLs separated with ';'|| By Pass Proxy works only when Proxy URL is mentioned
Set "true" to run the browser in background (headless mode) for faster Execution
The amount of maximum time (in seconds) to wait for the driver to load/connect
